messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Tami,  benefits
messages.msgSnippet: I m always encouraging my DH to quit his job, get a closing 4 hr shift at Starbucks for the benefits, and consider it socializing and coffee time. He s up til
messages.messageBody:
I'm always encouraging my DH to quit his job, get a closing 4 hr shift at
Starbucks for the benefits, and consider it socializing and coffee time.
He's up til 1 every night anyway, and coffee at night doesn't mean a thing.
And there are about five Starbucks within working distance.

***Geez, it sounds like Heaven! Perhaps I should become a barista and
support my habit.

Valerie in Tacoma, little latte land

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Tami,  benefits

messages.messageBody:
I'm always encouraging my DH to quit his job, get a closing 4 hr shift at
Starbucks for the benefits, and consider it socializing and coffee time.
He's up til 1 every night anyway, and coffee at night doesn't mean a thing.
And there are about five Starbucks within working distance. Of course he
hasn't done it! But it would provide the benefits and a little cash.
